meanings.definition: A screen for displaying video images.
meanings.sent1: The classroom had a large vidscreen for showing educational videos.
meanings.sent2: I watched a movie on the vidscreen in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch the moving images on the vidscreen.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vidscreen, replaying memories in vivid detail.
meanings.sent5: The vidscreen lit up with colorful animations, capturing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To display video images on a screen.
meanings.sent1: They will vidscreen the presentation during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: Can you vidscreen the game on the TV for me?
meanings.sent3: He vidscreened the funny cat videos to cheer up his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her smile vidscreened happiness to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The projector vidscreened the movie onto the blank wall, creating a makeshift theater.
